Alphah::

Inside the room where the Maximals are, Nischtstrike shouts and 
insults could be heard. "Not yet, it seems..." said Sadly 
Alpha"Perhaps we have to... sedate him before he... Before something 
else happen a let him calm down..."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade remembered the last time he tried. Skullgrin had then 
> resisted and he failed to bring him to the Maximals...
> 
> AzureBlade: So do I, Prowl... So do I... Is he sedated?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Prowl::
> > 
> > "Well, then I hope that there really is part of Condor still in 
him,
> > deep down, Azure."
